channel.title: Posts on imageFish GithubIO
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on imageFish GithubIO

item.title: Linux
item.description: Mount the disk parts automatically when starting the system sudo fdisk -l List the available disk parts sudo blkid List the UUID of each disk parts df -h check the used and free space of each disk parts vim /etc/fstab UUID= <empty mount folder> <file system type> <option (defaults)> 0 0 mount -a check the the commands in fstab is correct or not. Install the NVIDIA Gragh Card Driver Add the nouveau In /etc/modprobe.

item.title: First
item.description: this is a new begin think more

Mount the disk parts automatically when starting the system .task-list-item { list-style-type: none; } .task-list-item-checkbox { margin-left: -20px; vertical-align: middle; } body { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe WPC', 'Segoe UI', 'Ubuntu', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; } title: "Linux" date: 2019-05-07T16:13:56+08:00 Mount the disk parts automatically when starting the system sudo fdisk -l List the available disk parts sudo blkid List the UUID of each disk parts df -h check the used and free space of each disk parts vim /etc/fstab UUID= <empty mount folder> <file system type> <option (defaults)> 0 0 mount -a check the the commands in fstab is correct or not.
